channel.title: plantain on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in plantain on Recipes

item.title: baked plantains
item.description: 4 ripe plantains 1-2 pounds of cheese broken into long slices butter Peel the plantains. Once peeled cut down center. Bake, after filling with cheese, in a mold with butter. Once golden, prepare a white syrup and serve.
